features: Hybrid Engine: Java UI + Prolog logic brain
Explainable AI (XAI) for step-by-step move reasoning
Smart Pencil Marks with real-time candidate visualization
Logic-based generation for multiple difficulty levels
en.description: A masterclass in hybrid software engineering, this Sudoku system delegates its intelligence to an expert Prolog brain using Constraint Logic Programming. While the Java-based Swing GUI provides a premium Cyberpunk-inspired experience, the underlying Prolog agent provides unique 'Explainable AI' (XAI) transparency, allowing users to ask 'Why?' and receive a logical breakdown of any recommendation. It combines advanced candidate tracking, real-time board validation, and high-performance inter-process communication for a smooth, intelligent puzzle experience.

es.description: Una clase magistral de ingeniería de software híbrida, este sistema de Sudoku delega su inteligencia a un cerebro experto en Prolog utilizando Programación Lógica con Restricciones. Mientras que la interfaz Swing en Java ofrece una experiencia premium inspirada en el Cyberpunk, el agente de Prolog subyacente proporciona transparencia mediante 'IA Explicable' (XAI), permitiendo a los usuarios entender el razonamiento lógico tras cada jugada. Combina rastreo de candidatos y validación en tiempo real.
